name: Taco Dip
ingredients: 1 lb of ground beef and 1 package of Taco seasoning 1 small tub of sour cream (16oz)
1 bottle of green chile sauce (green taco sauce-­‐ mild)_ Shredded cheese
steps: Brown ground beef and taco seasoning. Add refried bean. Put on the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Then put a thin layer
of green chile sauce, layer sour cream, chopped olives, and the cheese on top. Put in oven at 375 for 15-­‐20 min.
